biotools.summary:
Fast enumeration of single- and multi-copy CRISPR binding sites.

JACKIE pipeline & database – Albert Cheng Lab.

JACKIE (Jackie and Albert’s CRISPR K-mer Instances Enumerator) scans the genome and enumerate all potential SpCas9 binding sequences and output their copy number and locations. A example use is for finding clusters of repetitive sequences for genomic imaging.
